message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you.  I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. I'd be willing to pay $10,800 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $11,100?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,900?
